original_text: But Saul increased all the more in strength, and confounded the Jews who lived in Damascus by proving that Jesus was the Christ.
korean_text: 사울은 힘을 더 얻어 예수를 그리스도라 증언하여 다메섹에 사는 유대인들을 당혹하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: But Saul increased all the more in strength
and confounded the Jews who lived in Damascus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다메섹에 사는 유대인들을 혼란스럽게 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: by proving that Jesus was the Christ.
